00128             function                connect( $ConfigRow )
00129             {
00130                   try
00131                   {
00132                         $Config = explode( "#" , $ConfigRow );
00133                         $this->Host = $Config[ 0 ];
00134                         $this->Username = $Config[ 1 ];
00135                         $this->Password = $Config[ 2 ];
00136                         $this->Database = $Config[ 3 ];
00137                         $this->TablenamePrefix = $Config[ 4 ];
00138                         
00139                         $this->Connection = @pg_pconnect( 
00140                               'host='.$this->Host.' user='.$this->Username.' password='.$this->Password.' dbname='.$this->Database
00141                         );
00142                   }
00143                   catch( Exception $e )
00144                   {
00145                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00146                   }
00147             }

00167             function                get_connection( $ForceReconnect = false )
00168             {
00169                   try
00170                   {
00171                         if( $this->Connection === false || $ForceReconnect ===true )
00172                         {
00173                               if( $this->Connection !== false )
00174                               {
00175                                     pg_close( $this->Connection );
00176                               }
00177                               $DBConfigSet = get_package( 'database::db_config_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00178                               $DBConfigSet->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_mysql_database' );
00179                               $this->Connection = $DBConfigSet->connect( $this );
00180                               if( pg_last_error() !== false )
00181                               {
00182                                     throw( 
00183                                           new Exception( 
00184                                                 'An error occured while setting connection to the database '.pg_last_error()
00185                                           )
00186                                     );
00187                               }
00188                               $this->Connection->query( 'SET AUTOCOMMIT = 0' );
00189                               $this->Connection->query( 'SET NAMES utf8' );
00190                         }
00191                         return( $this->Connection );
00192                   }
00193                   catch( Exception $e )
00194                   {
00195                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00196                   }
00197             }
00198             
00217             function                query( $Query )
00218             {
00219                   try
00220                   {
00221                         $Connection = $this->get_connection();
00222                   
00223                         $Start = microtime( true );
00224                         
00225                         $Query = str_replace( 'umx_' , $this->TablenamePrefix , $Query );
00226                   
00227                         $Result = pg_query( $Connection , $Query );
00228                         
00229                         if( $Connection->errno !== 0 )
00230                         {
00231                               throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while query execution '.$Connection->error ) );
00232                         }
00233                         
00234                         $End = microtime( true );
00235                         
00236                         if( $this->DBLogging )
00237                         {
00238                               $this->insert( 
00239                                     'umx_actions' , 
00240                                     'action_name , time , info' , "'".self::$QueryName."' , ".( $End - $Start )." , '".
00241                                           htmlspecialchars( $Query , ENT_QUOTES )."'"
00242                               );
00243                         }
00244                         
00245                         return( $Result );
00246                   }
00247                   catch( Exception $e )
00248                   {
00249                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00250                   }
00251             }

00349             function                fetch_results( $Result )
00350             {
00351                   try
00352                   {                       
00353                         $RetValues = array();
00354                               
00355                         for( $i = 0; $i < $Result->num_rows ; $i++ )
00356                         {
00357                               if( self::$QueryMode == DB_ASSOC_ARRAY )
00358                               {
00359                                     $RetValues [] = $Result->fetch_array( MYSQLI_ASSOC );
00360                               }
00361                               elseif( self::$QueryMode == DB_OBJECT )
00362                               {
00363                                     $RetValues [] = $Result->fetch_object();
00364                               }
00365                         }
00366                               
00367                         $Result->close();
00368 
00369                         return( $RetValues );
00370                   }
00371                   catch( Exception $e )
00372                   {
00373                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00374                   }
00375             }

00479             function                update( $Table , $Fields , $Values , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00480             {
00481                   try
00482                   {
00483                         $SubQuery = '';
00484                         
00485                         for( $i = 0 ; $i < count( $Fields ) - 1 ; $i++ )
00486                         {
00487                               $SubQuery .= $Fields[ $i ].' = '.$Values[ $i ].' , ';
00488                         }
00489                         $SubQuery .= $Fields[ count( $Fields ) - 1 ].' = '.$Values[ count( $Fields ) - 1 ];
00490                         
00491                         $this->query( "UPDATE $Table SET $SubQuery WHERE $Condition" );
00492                   }
00493                   catch( Exception $e )
00494                   {
00495                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00496                   }
00497             }
